bug.author: Ahmad5112
bug.description: I am trying to run a simulation of DQN training while after performing more then 20000 steps unreal engine stop responding like it hangs only way i have to is to restart the unreal engine and therefore i am unable to complete trainig

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ahmad5112>@Ahmad5112</denchmark-link> can you share the output of the log files in a <denchmark-link:https://help.github.com/articles/creating-gists/>github gist</denchmark-link> ? they should be in
